snippet: As the Senate opens debate on an overhaul of the nation’s immigration laws, organized labor is picking up the pace of its advocacy for the bill with television advertisements and lobbying efforts.
abstract: As the Senate opens debate on an overhaul of the nation’s immigration laws, organized labor is picking up the pace of its advocacy for the bill with television advertisements and lobbying efforts.

headline.main: As Senate Begins Debate, Organized Labor Makes Immigration Push

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: American Federation of Labor-Congress of Industrial Organizations
